resources.string: Lohono Stays â€“ Premium Villas - Ultra-Luxurious Home Rentals
Address - 42A, Impression House, GD Ambekar Marg, Kohinoor Mill, Wadala, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400031

Info - Villa H is a part of Fonteira, a gated community inspired by traditional Goan Vaddos. Located in the quaint town of Assagaon, also known as the "Beverly Hills of Goa", the home is surrounded by lush greenery and adorned with luxury at every nook and corner. This 3-storey home features a naturally lit living and dining area, 3 ensuite bedrooms, a study, a gazebo and a self-sufficient kitchen for you to cook up a storm in.

Lohono Stays specializes in creating and curating luxury holiday homes for rent all over the world. Tied in with our signature hospitality, the endeavour is to offer the most luxurious and comfortable holiday experiences to our guests with our private villas in Goa, Alibaug, Lonavala, Karjat, Mahabaleshwar, Mussoorie and Coonoor.
